title: Cherry Bomb - narrator's memories of summer

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Clair uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s memories of her fifth-grade summer world.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Clair uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s memories of her fifth-grade summer world.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
